   16: 
   17: -module(login_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: %% Suite configuration
   30: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   31: 
   32: -define(REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT, 2).  %% seconds
   33: 
   34: all() ->
   35:     [
   36:      {group, register},
   37:      {group, bad_registration},
   38:      {group, bad_cancelation},
   39:      {group, registration_timeout},
   40:      {group, change_account_details},
   41:      {group, login},
   42:      {group, login_scram},
   43:      {group, login_scram_store_plain},
   44:      {group, legacy_auth},
   45:      {group, messages}
   46:     ].
   47: 
   48: groups() ->
   49:     [{register, [sequence], [register,
   50:                              already_registered,
   51:                              check_unregistered]},
   52:      {bad_registration, [no_sequence], [null_password]},
   53:      {bad_cancelation, [no_sequence], [bad_request_registration_cancelation,
   54:                                        not_allowed_registration_cancelation]},
   55:      {registration_timeout, [sequence], [registration_timeout,
   56:                                          registration_failure_timeout]},
   57:      {change_account_details, [no_sequence], [change_password,
   58:                                               change_password_to_null]},
   59:      {login, [sequence], all_tests()},
   60:      {login_scram, [sequence], scram_tests()},
   61:      {login_scram_store_plain, [sequence], scram_tests()},
   62:      {legacy_auth, [sequence], [legacy_successful_plain,
   63:                                 legacy_unsuccessful_plain,
   64:                                 legacy_successful_digest,
   65:                                 legacy_blocked_user]},
   66:      {messages, [sequence], [messages_story, message_zlib_limit]}].
   67: 
   68: scram_tests() ->
   69:     [log_one, log_one_scram].
   70: 
   71: all_tests() ->
   72:     [log_one,
   73:      log_non_existent_plain,
   74:      log_one_digest,
   75:      log_non_existent_digest,
   76:      log_one_scram,
   77:      log_non_existent_scram,
   78:      blocked_user
   79:     ].
   80: 
   81: suite() ->
   82:     escalus:suite().
   83: 
   84: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   85: %% Init & teardown
   86: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   87: 
   88: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   89:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   90: 
   91: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   92:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   93: 
   94: init_per_group(register, Config) ->
   95:     skip_if_mod_register_not_enabled(Config);
   96: init_per_group(bad_registration, Config) ->
   97:     Config;
   98: init_per_group(bad_cancelation, Config) ->
   99:     skip_if_mod_register_not_enabled(Config);
  100: init_per_group(registration_timeout, Config) ->
  101:     case escalus_users:is_mod_register_enabled(Config) of
  102:         true ->
  103:             set_registration_timeout(Config);
  104:         _ ->
  105:             {skip, mod_register_disabled}
  106:     end;
  107: init_per_group(change_account_details, Config) ->
  108:     skip_if_mod_register_not_enabled(Config);
  109: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) when
  110:       GroupName == login_scram; GroupName == login_scram_store_plain ->
  111:     config_password_format(GroupName),
  112:     Config2 = escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])),
  113:     assert_password_format(GroupName, Config2);
  114: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  115:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
  116: 
  117: end_per_group(register, _Config) ->
  118:     ok;
  119: end_per_group(change_account_details, Config) ->
  120:     ok;
  121: end_per_group(bad_registration, _Config) ->
  122:     ok;
  123: end_per_group(bad_cancelation, _Config) ->
  124:     ok;
  125: end_per_group(registration_timeout, Config) ->
  126:     Config1 = restore_registration_timeout(Config);
  127: end_per_group(login_scram, Config) ->
  128:     set_store_password(plain),
  129:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob]));
  130: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  131:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
  132: 
  133: init_per_testcase(DigestOrScram, Config) when
  134:       DigestOrScram =:= log_one_digest; DigestOrScram =:= log_non_existent_digest;
  135:       DigestOrScram =:= log_one_scram; DigestOrScram =:= log_non_existent_scram;
  136:       DigestOrScram =:= legacy_successful_digest ->
  137:     case get_store_type() of
  138:         external ->
  139:             {skip, "external store type requires plain password"};
  140:         _ ->
  141:             escalus:init_per_testcase(DigestOrScram, Config)
  142:     end;
  143: init_per_testcase(check_unregistered, Config) ->
  144:     Config;
  145: init_per_testcase(change_password, Config0) ->
  146:     Config1 =  escalus:init_per_testcase(change_password, Config0),
  147:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([alice]));
  148: init_per_testcase(change_password_to_null, Config0) ->
  149:     Config1 =  escalus:init_per_testcase(change_password_to_null, Config0),
  150:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([alice]));
  151: init_per_testcase(bad_request_registration_cancelation, Config0) ->
  152:     Config1 =  escalus:init_per_testcase(bad_request_registration, Config0),
  153:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([alice]));
  154: init_per_testcase(not_allowed_registration_cancelation, Config0) ->
  155:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(not_allowed_registration_cancelation, Config0),
  156:     Config2 = escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([alice])),
  157:     %% Use a configuration that will not allow inband cancelation (and
  158:     %% registration).
  159:     restart_mod_register_with_option(Config2, access, {access, none});
  160: init_per_testcase(registration_failure_timeout, Config) ->
  161:     ok = deny_everyone_registration(),
  162:     escalus:init_per_testcase(registration_failure_timeout, Config);
  163: init_per_testcase(message_zlib_limit, Config) ->
  164:     Listeners = [Listener
  165:                  || {Listener, _, _} <- escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [listen])],
  166:     [{_U, Props}] = escalus_users:get_users([hacker]),
  167:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Props),
  168:     case lists:keymember(Port, 1, Listeners) of
  169:         true ->
  170:             escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([hacker])),
  171:             escalus:init_per_testcase(message_zlib_limit, Config);
  172:         false ->
  173:             {skip, port_not_configured_on_server}
  174:     end;
  175: init_per_testcase(Name, Config)
  176:   when Name == blocked_user; Name == legacy_blocked_user ->
  177:     Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  178:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(acl, add, [Domain, blocked, {user, <<"alice">>}]),
  179:     escalus:init_per_testcase(Name, Config);
  180: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  181:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  182: 
  183: end_per_testcase(Name, Config)
  184:   when Name == blocked_user; Name == legacy_blocked_user ->
  185:     Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  186:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(acl, delete, [Domain, blocked, {user, <<"alice">>}]),
  187:     Config;
  188: end_per_testcase(change_password, Config) ->
  189:     [{alice, Details}] = escalus_users:get_users([alice]),
  190:     Alice = {alice, lists:keyreplace(password, 1, Details, {password, strong_pwd()})},
  191:     {ok, result, Response} = escalus_users:delete_user(Config, Alice);
  192: end_per_testcase(change_password_to_null, Config) ->
  193:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice]));
  194: end_per_testcase(message_zlib_limit, Config) ->
  195:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([hacker]));
  196: end_per_testcase(check_unregistered, Config) ->
  197:     Config;
  198: end_per_testcase(bad_request_registration_cancelation, Config0) ->
  199:     true = user_exists(alice, Config0),
  200:     escalus:delete_users(Config0, escalus:get_users([alice]));
  201: end_per_testcase(not_allowed_registration_cancelation, Config) ->
  202:     restore_mod_register_options(Config),
  203:     true = user_exists(alice, Config),
  204:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice]));
  205: end_per_testcase(registration_timeout, Config) ->
  206:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob]));
  207: end_per_testcase(registration_failure_timeout, Config) ->
  208:     ok = allow_everyone_registration();
  209: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  210:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  211: 
  212: 
  213: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  214: %% Message tests
  215: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  216: 
  217: register(Config) ->
  218:     [{Name1, UserSpec1}, {Name2, UserSpec2}] = escalus_users:get_users([alice, bob]),
  219:     [{_, AdminSpec}] = escalus_users:get_users([admin]),
  220:     [Username1, Server1, _Pass1] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec1),
  221:     [Username2, Server2, _Pass2] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec2),
  222:     [AdminU, AdminS, AdminP] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, AdminSpec),
  223: 
  224:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, try_register, [AdminU, AdminS, AdminP]),
  225: 
  226:     escalus:story(Config, [{admin, 1}], fun(Admin) ->
  227:             escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([Name1, Name2])),
  228: 
  229:             Predicates = [
  230:                           fun(Stanza) ->
  231:                                   Body = exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"body">>}, cdata]),
  232:                                   escalus_pred:is_chat_message(Stanza)
  233:                                   andalso
  234:                                   re:run(Body, <<"registered">>, []) =/= nomatch
  235:                                   andalso
  236:                                   re:run(Body, Username, []) =/= nomatch
  237:                           end
  238:                           || Username <- [Username1, Username2]
  239:                          ],
  240:             escalus:assert_many(Predicates, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Admin, 2))
  241:         end).
  242: 
  243: already_registered(Config) ->
  244: 
  245:     %% This relies on Alice already being registered in test case
  246:     %% `register' in the same group as this test (group `register').
  247: 
  248:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  249: 
  250:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:get_registration_fields()),
  251: 
  252:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  253: 
  254:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
  255:         true = has_registered_element(Stanza)
  256: 
  257:     end).
  258: 
  259: null_password(Config) ->
  260:     [{alice, Details}] = escalus_users:get_users([alice]),
  261:     Alice = {alice, lists:keyreplace(password, 1, Details, {password, <<>>})},
  262:     {error, _, Response} = escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
  263:     escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Response),
  264:     %% This error response means there was no character data,
  265:     %% i.e. elements `<password\>' or `<password></password>' where
  266:     %% indeed present.
  267:     {username, Name} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, Details),
  268:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, Details),
  269:     escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"not-acceptable">>], Response),
  270:     false = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, is_user_exists, [Name, Server]).
  271: 
  272: check_unregistered(Config) ->
  273:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([admin, alice, bob])),
  274:     [{_, UserSpec}| _] = escalus_users:get_users(all),
  275:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
  276:     false = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, is_user_exists, [Username, Server]).
  277: 
  278: bad_request_registration_cancelation(Config) ->
  279: 
  280:     %% To quote XEP 0077, section 3.2, table 1 (unregister error
  281:     %% cases): "The <remove/> element [is] not the only child element
  282:     %% of the <query/> element."
  283: 
  284:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  285: 
  286:         %% Alice sends bad cancelation request
  287:         escalus:send(Alice, bad_cancelation_stanza()),
  288: 
  289:         %% Alice receives failure response
  290:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  291:         escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Stanza),
  292:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"bad-request">>], Stanza)
  293: 
  294:     end).
  295: 
  296: not_allowed_registration_cancelation(Config) ->
  297: 
  298:     %% To quote XEP 0077, section 3.2, table 1 (unregister error
  299:     %% cases): "No sender is allowed to cancel registrations in-band."
  300: 
  301:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  302: 
  303:         %% Alice sends cancelation request
  304:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:remove_account()),
  305: 
  306:         %% Alice receives failure response
  307:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  308:         escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Stanza),
  309:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"not-allowed">>], Stanza)
  310: 
  311:     end).
  312: 
  313: registration_timeout(Config) ->
  314:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(?REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT)),
  315:     [Alice, Bob] = escalus_users:get_users([alice, bob]),
  316: 
  317:     %% The first user should be created successfully
  318:     escalus_users:verify_creation(escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice)),
  319: 
  320:     %% Creation of the second one should err because of not timing out yet
  321:     {error, failed_to_register, Stanza} = escalus_users:create_user(Config, Bob),
  322:     escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Stanza),
  323:     %% Something else may be more acceptable for the assertion
  324:     %% below... 2nd paragraph, section 3.1.1, XEP 0077: [...] a server
  325:     %% MAY return a `<not-acceptable/>' stanza error if [...] an
  326:     %% entity attempts to register a second identity after
  327:     %% successfully completing the registration use case.
  328:     escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"wait">>, <<"resource-constraint">>], Stanza),
  329: 
  330:     %% After timeout, the user should be registered successfully
  331:     timer:sleep(erlang:round(?REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT * 1.5 * 1000)),
  332:     escalus_users:verify_creation(escalus_users:create_user(Config, Bob)).
  333: 
  334: registration_failure_timeout(Config) ->
  335:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(?REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT)),
  336:     [Alice] = escalus_users:get_users([alice]),
  337: 
  338:     %% Registration of the first user should fail because of access denial
  339:     {error,failed_to_register,R} = escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
  340:     escalus:assert(is_iq_error, R),
  341:     escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>], R),
  342: 
  343:     %% Registration of a second one should fail because requests were
  344:     %% made in quick succession
  345:     {error,failed_to_register,S} = escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
  346:     escalus:assert(is_iq_error, S),
  347:     escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"wait">>, <<"resource-constraint">>], S).
  348: 
  349: change_password(Config) ->
  350: 
  351:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  352: 
  353:         escalus:send(Alice,
  354:             Q = escalus_stanza:iq_set(?NS_INBAND_REGISTER,
  355:                 [#xmlel{name = <<"username">>,
  356:                         children = [#xmlcdata{content = <<"alice">>}]},
  357:                  #xmlel{name = <<"password">>,
  358:                         children = [#xmlcdata{content = strong_pwd()}]}])),
  359: 
  360:         R = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  361: 
  362:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, [Q], R)
  363: 
  364:     end).
  365: 
  366: change_password_to_null(Config) ->
  367: 
  368:     %% Section 3.3, XEP 0077: If the user provides an empty password
  369:     %% element or a password element that contains no XML character
  370:     %% data (i.e., either <password/> or <password></password>), the
  371:     %% server or service MUST NOT change the password to a null value,
  372:     %% but instead MUST maintain the existing password.
  373: 
  374:     %% By the above, `end_per_testcase' should succeed. XEP 0077
  375:     %% doesn't say how how an XMPP sever should respond, but since
  376:     %% this is in IQ, it must: so we choose to require a `not-allowed'
  377:     %% response.
  378: 
  379:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  380: 
  381:         escalus:send(Alice,
  382:             escalus_stanza:iq_set(?NS_INBAND_REGISTER,
  383:                 [#xmlel{name = <<"username">>,
  384:                         children = [#xmlcdata{content = <<"alice">>}]},
  385:                  #xmlel{name = <<"password">>,
  386:                         children = [#xmlcdata{content = <<"">>}]}])),
  387: 
  388:         R = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  389: 
  390:         escalus:assert(is_iq_error, R),
  391:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"bad-request">>], R)
  392: 
  393:     end).
  394: 
  395: log_one(Config) ->
  396:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  397: 
  398:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  399:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi!">>], escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  400: 
  401:         end).
  402: 
  403: log_one_digest(Config) ->
  404:     log_one([{escalus_auth_method, <<"DIGEST-MD5">>} | Config]).
  405: 
  406: log_one_scram(Config) ->
  407:     log_one([{escalus_auth_method, <<"SCRAM-SHA-1">>} | Config]).
  408: 
  409: 
  410: log_non_existent_plain(Config) ->
  411:     {auth_failed, _, _} = log_non_existent(Config).
  412: 
  413: log_non_existent_digest(Config) ->
  414:     R = log_non_existent([{escalus_auth_method, <<"DIGEST-MD5">>} | Config]),
  415:     {expected_challenge, _, _} = R.
  416: 
  417: log_non_existent_scram(Config) ->
  418:     R = log_non_existent([{escalus_auth_method, <<"SCRAM-SHA-1">>} | Config]),
  419:     {expected_challenge, _, _} = R.
  420: 
  421: log_non_existent(Config) ->
  422:     [{kate, UserSpec}] = escalus_users:get_users([kate]),
  423:     {error, {connection_step_failed, _, R}} = escalus_client:start(Config, UserSpec, <<"res">>),
  424:     R.
  425: 
  426: blocked_user(_Config) ->
  427:     [{_, Spec}] = escalus_users:get_users([alice]),
  428:     try
  429:         {ok, _Alice, _Spec2, _Features} = escalus_connection:start(Spec),
  430:         ct:fail("Alice authenticated but shouldn't")
  431:     catch
  432:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_iq_result, Stanza, _Bin} ->
  433:             <<"cancel">> = exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"error">>}, {attr, <<"type">>}])
  434:     end,
  435:     ok.
  436: 
  437: messages_story(Config) ->
  438:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  439: 
  440:         % Alice sends a message to Bob
  441:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  442: 
  443:         % Bob gets the message
  444:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi!">>, escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
  445: 
  446:     end).
  447: 
  448: message_zlib_limit(Config) ->
  449:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  450:         [{_, Spec}] = escalus_users:get_users([hacker]),
  451:         {ok, Hacker, _Spec2, _Features} = escalus_connection:start(Spec),
  452: 
  453:         ManySpaces = [ 32 || _N <- lists:seq(1, 10*1024) ],
  454: 
  455:         escalus:send(Hacker, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, ManySpaces)),
  456: 
  457:         escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"policy-violation">>, <<"XML stanza is too big">>],
  458:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Hacker)),
  459:         escalus:assert(is_stream_end, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Hacker))
  460: 
  461:     end).
  462: 
  463: legacy_successful_digest(Config) ->
  464:     legacy_auth(Config, legacy_auth_digest).
  465: 
  466: legacy_successful_plain(Config) ->
  467:     legacy_auth(Config, legacy_auth_plain).
  468: legacy_unsuccessful_plain(Config) ->
  469:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  470:     NewSpec = lists:keyreplace(password, 1, Spec, {password, <<"wrong_pass">>}),
  471:     Users = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  472:     NewUsers = lists:keyreplace(alice, 1, Users, {alice, NewSpec}),
  473:     NewConfig = lists:keyreplace(escalus_users, 1, Config, {escalus_users, NewUsers}),
  474:     try
  475:         legacy_auth(NewConfig, legacy_auth_plain),
  476:         ct:fail("Authenticated but shouldn't")
  477:     catch
  478:         error:{assertion_failed,assert,is_iq_result,_,_,_} ->
  479:             ok
  480:     end.
  481: 
  482: legacy_auth(Config, Function) ->
  483:     %% given
  484:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  485:     Steps = [
  486:              %% when
  487:              {legacy_stream_helper, start_stream_pre_xmpp_1_0},
  488:              {legacy_stream_helper, Function}
  489:             ],
  490:     %% ok, now do the plan from above
  491:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
  492:     escalus_connection:stop(Conn).
  493: 
  494: 
  495: legacy_blocked_user(Config) ->
  496:     try
  497:         legacy_auth(Config, legacy_auth_plain),
  498:         ct:fail("alice authenticated but shouldn't")
  499:     catch
  500:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_iq_result, _, Stanza, _Bin} ->
  501:             <<"cancel">> = exml_query:path(Stanza,
  502:                                            [{element, <<"error">>},
  503:                                             {attr, <<"type">>}])
  504:     end.
  505: 
  506: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  507: %% Helpers
  508: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  509: 
  510: skip_if_mod_register_not_enabled(Config) ->
  511:     case escalus_users:is_mod_register_enabled(Config) of
  512:         true ->
  513:             Config; % will create users inside test case
  514:         _ ->
  515:             {skip, mod_register_disabled}
  516:     end.
  517: 
  518: strong_pwd() ->
  519:     <<"Sup3r","c4li","fr4g1","l1571c","3xp1","4l1","d0c10u5">>.
  520: 
  521: set_registration_timeout(Config) ->
  522:     Record = {local_config, registration_timeout, ?REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT},
  523:     OldTimeout = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option,
  524:                                       [registration_timeout]),
  525:     true = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ets, insert, [local_config, Record]),
  526:     [ {old_timeout, OldTimeout} | Config ].
  527: 
  528: restore_registration_timeout(Config) ->
  529:     {old_timeout, OldTimeout} = proplists:lookup(old_timeout, Config),
  530:     Record = {local_config, registration_timeout, OldTimeout},
  531:     true = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ets, insert, [local_config, Record]),
  532:     proplists:delete(old_timeout, Config).
  533: 
  534: deny_everyone_registration() ->
  535:     ok = change_registration_settings_for_everyone(deny).
  536: 
  537: allow_everyone_registration() ->
  538:     ok = change_registration_settings_for_everyone(allow).
  539: 
  540: change_registration_settings_for_everyone(Rule)
  541:   when allow =:= Rule; deny =:= Rule ->
  542:     {atomic,ok} = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, add_global_option,
  543:         [{access, register, global}, [{Rule, all}]]),
  544:     ok.
  545: 
  546: get_client_details(Identifier) ->
  547:     [{Identifier, Details}] = escalus_users:get_users([Identifier]),
  548:     {username, Name} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, Details),
  549:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, Details),
  550:     {string(Name), string(Server)}.
  551: 
  552: get_store_type() ->
  553:     XMPPDomain = escalus_ejabberd:unify_str_arg(
  554:                    ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)),
  555:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, store_type,
  556:                          [XMPPDomain]).
  557: 
  558: set_store_password(Type) ->
  559:     XMPPDomain = escalus_ejabberd:unify_str_arg(
  560:                    ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)),
  561:     AuthOpts = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option,
  562:                                     [{auth_opts, XMPPDomain}]),
  563:     NewAuthOpts = lists:keystore(password_format, 1, AuthOpts, {password_format, Type}),
  564:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, add_local_option,
  565:                          [{auth_opts, XMPPDomain}, NewAuthOpts]).
  566: 
  567: 
  568: 
  569: config_password_format(login_scram) ->
  570:     set_store_password(scram);
  571: config_password_format(_) ->
  572:     set_store_password(plain).
  573: 
  574: assert_password_format(GroupName, Config) ->
  575:     Users = proplists:get_value(escalus_users, Config),
  576:     [verify_format(GroupName, User) || User <- Users],
  577:     Config.
  578: 
  579: verify_format(GroupName, {_User, Props}) ->
  580:     Username = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(proplists:get_value(username, Props)),
  581:     Server = proplists:get_value(server, Props),
  582:     Password = proplists:get_value(password, Props),
  583: 
  584:     SPassword = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, get_password, [Username, Server]),
  585:     do_verify_format(GroupName, Password, SPassword).
  586: 
  587: do_verify_format(login_scram, _Password, SPassword) ->
  588:     %% returned password is a tuple containing scram data
  589:     {_, _, _, _} = SPassword;
  590: do_verify_format(_, Password, SPassword) ->
  591:     Password = SPassword.
  592: 
  593: has_registered_element(Stanza) ->
  594:         [#xmlel{name = <<"registered">>}] =:= exml_query:paths(Stanza,
  595:             [{element, <<"query">>}, {element, <<"registered">>}]).
  596: 
  597: bad_cancelation_stanza() ->
  598:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{name = <<"query">>,
  599:         attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"jabber:iq:register">>}],
  600:         children = [#xmlel{name = <<"remove">>},
  601:                     %% The <remove/> element is not the only child element of the
  602:                     %% <query/> element.
  603:                     #xmlel{name = <<"foo">>}]}]).
  604: 
  605: restart_mod_register_with_option(Config, Name, Value) ->
  606:     Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
  607:     ModuleOptions = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, loaded_modules_with_opts, [Domain]),
  608:     {mod_register, OldRegisterOptions} = lists:keyfind(mod_register, 1, ModuleOptions),
  609:     {atomic, ok} = dynamic_modules:stop(Domain, mod_register),
  610:     NewRegisterOptions = lists:keystore(Name, 1, OldRegisterOptions, Value),
  611:     ok = dynamic_modules:start(Domain, mod_register, NewRegisterOptions),
  612:     [{old_mod_register_opts, OldRegisterOptions}|Config].
  613: 
  614: restore_mod_register_options(Config0) ->
  615:     Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config0),
  616:     {value, {old_mod_register_opts, RegisterOpts}, Config1} =
  617:         lists:keytake(old_mod_register_opts, 1, Config0),
  618:     {atomic, ok} = dynamic_modules:stop(Domain, mod_register),
  619:     ok = dynamic_modules:start(Domain, mod_register, RegisterOpts),
  620:     Config1.
  621: 
  622: user_exists(Name, Config) ->
  623:     {Name, Client} = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(Name),
  624:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, Client),
  625:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, is_user_exists, [Username, Server]).
  626: 
  627: string(<<_/binary>> = Subject) ->
  628:     erlang:binary_to_list(Subject).
